mapper.select: select id , token , expireTime from user where id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET token = #{token}, expireTime = DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 HOUR) WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, password, name, amount) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, 0)

INSERT INTO auctionList ( imagePath1, imagePath2, imagePath3, contentName, seller, startTime, startPrice, nowPrice ) VALUES ( #{imgPath1}, #{imgPath2}, #{imgPath3}, #{contentName}, #{seller}, #{startTime}, #{startPrice}, #{nowPrice} )
mapper.select: SELECT no, imagePath1 as image, contentName, seller, startTime, startPrice, nowPrice FROM auctionList WHERE status != 'finish';

SELECT A.no, A.imagePath1 as imgPath1, A.imagePath2 as imgPath2, A.imagePath3 as imgPath3, A.contentName, A.seller, A.startTime, A.startPrice, A.nowPrice, A.status, U.name as buyerId FROM auctionList A LEFT JOIN user U on A.buyerId = U.id WHERE A.no = ${no};
SELECT nowPrice, buyerId FROM auctionList WHERE no = #{no}
